com.twofortyfouram.assertion

Class Assertions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twofortyfouram.assertion.Assertions

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class Assertions
extends java.lang.Object
    Runtime assertions.

    • Method Detail

      • assertInRangeInclusive

        public static void assertInRangeInclusive(int actual,
                          int minInclusive,
                          int maxInclusive,
                          @NonNull
                          java.lang.String name)
        Parameters:
        actual - Value to check whether it is in the range [ minInclusive, maxInclusive].
        minInclusive - Minimum value for actual.
        maxInclusive - Maximum value for actual.
        name - Name of the value for human-readable exceptions.
        Throws:
        java.lang.AssertionError - If actual is outside the range [ minInclusive, maxInclusive].
